title: Root Beer Float Oreo Cookie Review - Oreo Oration
description:
Why?! Why, Oreo?!

This episode is because of your support on Patreon. Thank you: http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

SUBSCRIBE / LIKE / SHARE / BUY A SHIRT: http://www.districtlines.com/kindafunny

While you were living your life, Nabisco went crazy and made an army of Oreo cookies. Whenever a noteworthy cookie comes, Greg Miller tears open a new package and reviews a new version of Milk's Favorite Cookie. 

Subscribe so you don't miss a review: http://www.youtube.com/user/gameovergreggy?sub_confirmation=1

Let us know what Oreo we should review next in the comments.

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

Like Greg on Facebook: http://facebook.com/gameovergreggy

Check out the Oreo Oration FAQ: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aO6zw2LeJ3c&list=PLOlEpGVXWUVseSo6bQHB1ad2cN_qV3aXs&index=1

Our theme is "Game-A-Tron" off of Daemon Hatfield's album Colorbeam. Buy it on iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/colorbeam/id426986325

Thanks to Nick and Tim for filming.

Mega-Thanks to Matt Gravish for making the Oreo Oration logo and intro.

transcript_chunks.text: [Music] what's up everybody Welcome to Oreo oration I'm Greg and while you out living your life the find people at Oreo are making endless variations to milk's favorite cookie so whenever there's one in the news and thanks to your support on patreon I tear open new packages and give you tasty reviews without any calories if you like that like the video subscribe to us on YouTube Share us with your friends even your enemies today we're reviewing root beer float Oreos now if you want to talk about something out of left field I've talked about on this show before I cannot get over that there is someone still doing this at some point you think they would have used up all the flavors you could pair with an Oreo but here's a root beer float you it's limited edition it comes out and you say why not I'll tell you now here's my root beer floats story I I'm not a huge fan of them once went to my childhood friend's house Travis he was still a child I was still a child childhood friends for a

not I'll tell you now here's my root beer floats story I I'm not a huge fan of them once went to my childhood friend's house Travis he was still a child I was still a child childhood friends for a sleepover had my first root beer float threw up now number one this is why I don't like kids they just throw up for no reason number two just kind of soured the whole root beer float experience for me but once in a while somebody will be sharing those little those little root beer gummies you know I'll get into it all right every oration begins with the patented first look and these are some tan jerks there they are they're pretty they're pristine we're missing one right there gives me the nice the room for the Holy Ghost woo I didn't even get close to it it was right here I started this it smells like root beer hold on now now that I'm close right here is optimal when you get it take your take your hand and do this and then yeah if you can put your chin where my thumb is that's going to be

like root beer hold on now now that I'm close right here is optimal when you get it take your take your hand and do this and then yeah if you can put your chin where my thumb is that's going to be that's going to make it it smells like root beer but if you get really close smells like some other candy I can't remember maybe that's just the smell of my brain cells nine first look impressive they're there they're I mean they're not it's impressive that they're not broken wish there wasn't this the white is blazingly white and I think it might be just because it's it's paired with the tan Brown like you know what I mean like something's going on there let's get right to taste see what this guy's got going wow he is he is packed tight I always talk about the these flavored ones being double stuff that guy is pushing his weight class for sure on that one see how it goes try to get I'm going to try to get both in there even though I don't know I guess oh so like so like usually you know

stuff that guy is pushing his weight class for sure on that one see how it goes try to get I'm going to try to get both in there even though I don't know I guess oh so like so like usually you know like we did the other ones where you have the two colors there's two different things caramel and apple this one I guess it's like the froth of the root beer the ice cream of the root beer yeah ice cream whatever I know talking about another root beer story I used to live next to Bill and Betty they were nice people they were my parents friends root beer was the only like soda they carry in the house what the here's what's happening in my mouth not in Billy Betty's house it tastes like a root beer float the cream I do not like the way the shortbread cookie is mixing with said CREAM nor do I like the the the shortbread cookie on it on that one there I'm going to go from a different column here it was like it was like soft you know what I mean it wasn't super hard you want a a hard hard

I like the the the shortbread cookie on it on that one there I'm going to go from a different column here it was like it was like soft you know what I mean it wasn't super hard you want a a hard hard cookie much better and know and I'm checking my biases here about root beer and vomiting and Bill and Betty at the door I just don't it's it's an overpowering taste and you can get the hints of the root beer there but then it turns into something else that it's like when you're brushing your teeth you know and the toothpaste hits your saliva and it just keeps getting like frothier that's the what it it feels like but not like the mint part of it just the froth part of it and then the SHP red cookie no let's see how they pair with milk not terrible but I would not I can already tell you I would not oh got a little too excited there I can tell you I wouldn't be I won't be buying these again one let me call a moment two that's him three bad picture of him you're a fascinating fascinating

not oh got a little too excited there I can tell you I wouldn't be I won't be buying these again one let me call a moment two that's him three bad picture of him you're a fascinating fascinating creature so they always say doctors that you know your sense of taste is really influenced by your sense of smell right we did the whole test with the hand so you know how to smell them at home but dunking them in the milk negates their smell which then changes The Taste still the frothy thing where I feel like it's getting bigger and bigger in my mouth which happens often but the taste is still off still a little it's still it's still still yeah H let's go to twist test one twist great two don't need another one also don't need eat it final score for root beer float Oreos I don't like the taste some people might I'm this is this is going to be one of those ones where you're there's a line in the sand here on how you feel about this cookie which to me means I can't F I can't go below five
